sentences.en: Pindus Road was a long, wide, straight street that ran parallel with Brea Road.
sentences.cn: 平德斯路与布莱德路平行,是一条又长 、 又宽 、 又直的街道.

sentences.en: When she told him to keep it, he politely refused and the tip into Brea'spocket.
sentences.cn: 当她告诉他把钱收下时, 酒保礼貌地拒绝并把小费放进贝瑞雅的口袋.

trans.tran_cn: LV旗下具有女人味与时尚气质的手袋
